title: Online Education Design Based on Theater Arts for Fostering 21st-Century Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social studies teaching experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented program for teacher professional development in smartphone-centric mobile learning environments.

learning_goals: Role-playing and situational drama techniques can enhance the ability to design social problem-solving projects.
Team-based problem-solving skills can be cultivated through digital collaboration tools (such as KakaoTalk Open Chat).
Creative instructional design capabilities can be strengthened by applying theatrical expression techniques (gestures, vocalization, improvisation).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
